messages.subject: Re: an *unschooling* curriculum package
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 02/13/2002 6:47:51 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... They are very cool. We ve played with them a bunch, and I play with them by myself even
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 02/13/2002 6:47:51 AM Eastern Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:


> Count me in too! I'd also be interested. I'm already loving all the movie
> recommendations. Kinda like homework!
> Pat, you should also consider getting Sandra's Thinking Sticks, if you
> haven't already. Those are cool, too.
>
> Karin
>
>

They are very cool. We've played with them a bunch, and I play with them by
myself even more.

At Christmas each person in my family makes a gift for each of the others.
This year Beth (my partner, who is a Professional Girl Scout) and Julian had
been doing lots of skits for me. So I made them a kit based on Sandra's
Thinking Sticks, with characters and plot ideas for skits. You can take as
few or as many sticks out as you want. They LOVED it.

I love this unschooling curriculum idea. I'd love to help field test too.

Kathryn



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
